alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued April 03 at 4:35PM MDT until April 03 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...Eastern Fremont county and El Paso county. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until midnight MDT tonight. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, until 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility are expected. Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An area of blowing dust which originated in the San Luis Valley is pushing over the Sangre De Cristo mountains and will move across eastern Fremont and El Paso counties late this afternoon and early evening. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.
